e: ￹`Hakowa~ `ko~ `nika~ `rara~`ay~?￺How far apart are the two?￻兩者相隔多遠？
￹`Ma~`raay~ `ko~ `loma'~ `ako~.￺My home is a long distance away.￻我家住很遠
￹`I~ `raay~ `a~ `ma~`'araw~ `ako~ `cingra~.￺I saw him a long distance away.￻我在很遠的地方看到他
￹`Ma~`rara~`ay~ `ko~ `loma'~ `ita~￺Our homes are far from each other.￻我們家相隔的距離很遠
